cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV. 

The paper deals with the application of word vector embeddings in information retrieval, which is a core topic in the field of information retrieval (cs.IR). Additionally, the paper discusses the use of similarity measures between word vectors, which is a common theme in natural language processing (cs.CL) and machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also proposes a novel approach to document and query representation, which involves the use of word embeddings, a technique commonly used in artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and computer vision (cs.CV).
